scripts.build: npm run build:gateway && npm run build:ddtec && npm run build:hrm && npm run build:learning
scripts.build:gateway: cd gateway && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:ddtec: cd services/ddtec && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:hrm: cd services/minimalistic-hrm && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:learning: cd services/minimalistic-learning && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:ddtec" "npm run dev:hrm" "npm run dev:learning"
scripts.dev:gateway: cd gateway && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.dev:ddtec: cd services/ddtec && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.dev:hrm: cd services/minimalistic-hrm && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.dev:learning: cd services/minimalistic-learning && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:gateway" "npm run start:ddtec" "npm run start:hrm" "npm run start:learning"
